name: Cog and Balls
description:
GMTK 2021 - "Joined Together"

-The fate of these balls are joined together by one cog wheel which you control

-Rotate the cog wheel (with the blue arrows) using the arrow keys or A and D

-Escape the maze before the portals capture either of the balls

-Music and Sound effects by Aaron Keane (Ableton Live)

-Game Design and programming by Ciaran Lowe (Unity) (Ink Space)

-Our first game jam so any and all feedback much appreciated, either here or on twitter @LoweC94

-Big thank you to Kenney whose Art assets we used and  fsuarez913 whose font we used (Mario256)

-https://kenney.nl/assets?q=2d

-https://www.dafont.com/super-mario-256.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
